featured.text: A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

definition.zh_def: 天體（如月亮或行星）遮蔽另一天體的現象。
definition.en_def: An astronomical event where one celestial body moves into the shadow of another celestial body.
definition.example: During the solar eclipse, the moon completely covered the sun.
